trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnStateChangedEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnStateChangedEventArgs" /> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnStateChanged" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il metodo che gestirà l'evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnStateChanged" /> di un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.

trans-unit.source: This event is raised when the value of one of the following column properties changes for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control
trans-unit.target: Questo evento viene generato quando cambia il valore di una delle seguenti proprietà delle colonne per un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> in un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> controllo

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla gestione degli eventi, vedere [NIB: utilizzo degli eventi](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
